string.text: As for the work of the guide...
What?
I saw your message. Are you looking for a guide?
I agree. We can go.
Great. Come on!
Oh, dude, you have not enough money for paying the penalty.
Remind me, where shall we go.
We arrived.
At last! Thank you, stalker, you did a good job. This money is your now.
And since you did it much earlier, take the bonus as well.
I refuse the task.
Are you sure?
Yes.
Do not mind it.
I`m looking for an stalker, who will escort to %s. At the moment I`m in %s.
We are late! We have agreed : pay the penalty of %s rubles.
Yes. I`m going to visit some place. The reward will be worth. After %s hours I`ll have to get into %s, I`ll pay %s rubles. Just remember, if we do not arrive in time, I`ll take %s as the penalty.
If you do it in %s hours, I'll give you a bonus.
I should be in
But we have agreed! Pay the penalty of %s rubles.
Size way (Include the start and end level):
How much time is left?
%s hours and %s minutes.
Bonus for %s hours before the end.
You can't travel as a guide
As a guide, you have lost the entire squad.
%c[255,135,183,116]Guide\n%c[default]%s needs a guide.
%c[255,135,183,116]Guide\n%c[default]%s should be in %s. It should be right around here.
